job_tasks.phrase: ontwerpen en realiseren we de digitale sales en service mogelijkheden voor onze klanten door middel van toonaangevende strategieën en technologieën zoals Salesforce en MuleSoft.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activity of designing and realizing digital sales and service capabilities using specific technologies, which falls under traditional software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Je zal bedrijfsprocessen transformeren naar technische oplossingen en doet dit door middel van code schrijven en configureren en door een adviserende rol te vervullen richting de klant.
job_tasks.justification: Transforming business processes into technical solutions through coding and configuration is a direct example of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: leveren van applicaties (bijv. user interfaces, sales en service processes, B2C en B2B communities, APIs, mobile apps, Einstein of Heroku);
job_tasks.justification: Listing the delivery of various application components like UIs, APIs, and mobile apps clearly falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Ernaar streven om altijd kwaliteit en veiligheid voorop te stellen in alles wat we doen.
job_tasks.justification: Prioritizing quality and security in all actions is a fundamental aspect of robust software development and integration practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Je zult werken met klanten die vaak Agile werken om nieuwe functionaliteit te ontwikkelen en implementeren met behulp van het toonaangevende SaaS-platform, Salesforce.
job_tasks.justification: Developing and implementing new functionality using a SaaS platform like Salesforce, especially within an Agile framework, is a core software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Je wordt verwacht samen te werken met de klant en betrokken te zijn bij zowel functionele als technische workshops om klantvereisten te verzamelen en te documenteren.
job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with clients and participating in workshops to gather and document requirements is a standard part of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Uitdagingen en verbeteringen communiceren aan de klant en de klanten en eindgebruikers ondersteunen tijdens en na de Go-Live.
job_tasks.justification: Communicating challenges and improvements to clients, and supporting users post-launch, are integral parts of the software delivery and integration process.

job_tasks.phrase: Innovatieve technologieën zoals GenAI, Conversational AI, Voice Assistants en andere geavanceerde oplossingen verkennen en toepassen, met een focus op het bevorderen van creatief denken en het stimuleren van impactvolle zakelijke innovatie.
job_tasks.justification: Exploring and applying innovative technologies like GenAI, Conversational AI, and Voice Assistants, with a focus on business innovation, indicates a specialization in AI technologies, fitting into Data Engineering & Management as it relates to applying these advanced solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: een diploma in hoger/universitair onderwijs op het gebied van Computer Science, Software Engineering, AI, (Technische) Informatica, of andere relevante opleidingen;
job_tasks.justification: The educational background requested (Computer Science, Software Engineering) directly aligns with the core software engineering domain.

job_tasks.phrase: Ervaring met programmeertalen zoals Apex (erg vergelijkbaar met Java), JavaScript, SQL, HTML en CSS.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly lists programming languages and related web technologies used in software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Een goed begrip hebben van versiebeheersystemen, zoals Git, en een basiskennis van hoe je je updates naar productie kunt vrijgeven volgens CICD-principes.
job_tasks.justification: Understanding version control systems like Git and CI/CD principles are key components of MLOps and modern software development pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: Kennis en ervaring met methoden en technieken zoals Salesforce, Force.com en Agile/SCRUM zijn een pluspunt.
job_tasks.justification: Salesforce and Force.com are SaaS platforms and development frameworks, fitting into the Application Frameworks category.

job_tasks.phrase: Aangetoonde interesse in het ontwikkelen van klantprocessen en een sterke enthousiasme voor implementaties met gebruikmaking van GenAI, Conversational AI, Voice Assistants, enzovoort.
job_tasks.justification: Expressing enthusiasm for implementing GenAI, Conversational AI, and Voice Assistants indicates a focus on applying these advanced AI technologies, which falls under the broader scope of Data Engineering & Management in terms of application.

soft_skills.phrase: door een adviserende rol te vervullen richting de klant.
soft_skills.justification: Fulfilling an advisory role towards the client implies communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Je wordt verwacht samen te werken met de klant en betrokken te zijn bij zowel functionele als technische workshops om klantvereisten te verzamelen en te documenteren.
soft_skills.justification: Working with the client and being involved in workshops to gather requirements highlights collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Uitdagingen en verbeteringen communiceren aan de klant en de klanten en eindgebruikers ondersteunen tijdens en na de Go-Live.
soft_skills.justification: Communicating challenges and supporting users are direct examples of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: ontwikkel jezelf tot Developer, Architect, Release Engineer of System Integrator.
soft_skills.justification: The statement about developing oneself into different roles indicates a focus on learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: neem deel aan het Delivery Excellence Program, dat bestaat uit trainingen, kennisdelingssessies en certificeringsmogelijkheden.
soft_skills.justification: Participation in a program with training and knowledge sharing sessions directly points to learning and development.

soft_skills.phrase: Innovatieve technologieën zoals GenAI, Conversational AI, Voice Assistants en andere geavanceerde oplossingen verkennen en toepassen
soft_skills.justification: Exploring and applying innovative technologies demonstrates a commitment to learning and adapting to new advancements.

soft_skills.phrase: Natuurlijk wil je elke dag nieuwe dingen ontdekken en leren en wil je tot de kern komen van het echte probleem van de klant.
soft_skills.justification: The desire to discover and learn new things daily is a clear indicator of a learning and adaptable mindset.

soft_skills.phrase: met een focus op het bevorderen van creatief denken en het stimuleren van impactvolle zakelijke innovatie.
soft_skills.justification: Focusing on fostering creative thinking and driving business innovation suggests an innovative and ownership-driven approach.

soft_skills.phrase: Aangetoonde interesse in het ontwikkelen van klantprocessen en een sterke enthousiasme voor implementaties met gebruikmaking van GenAI, Conversational AI, Voice Assistants, enzovoort.
soft_skills.justification: Enthusiasm for implementing advanced AI technologies shows a proactive and innovative drive.

soft_skills.phrase: Bovenal durf je jezelf te zijn. De ware jij. Met je eigen sterke punten, blik op de wereld en persoonlijkheid.
soft_skills.justification: Encouraging individuals to be their true selves with their strengths and perspectives aligns with fostering ownership and individuality.

profile.rationale: The job ad heavily emphasizes traditional software development tasks, integration with platforms like Salesforce, and general software engineering practices (coding, configuration, Agile, CI/CD, Git). While it mentions exploring and applying GenAI, Conversational AI, and Voice Assistants, these are presented as innovative technologies to be applied within the context of digital sales and service solutions, rather than the core focus of model development or deep AI specialization. The role is about building and integrating these AI capabilities into existing customer solutions, making it an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer role.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines a strong foundation in software engineering and integration, with AI technologies mentioned as an area of exploration and application. The distinction between core AI development and AI integration is reasonably clear, leading to a confident assignment of the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile. A slightly lower score is given because the AI aspects, while present, are not the primary focus and could be interpreted with slightly more depth depending on the specific projects.
